bibl.bibl: Lawes, John Bennet, et al. 1879–99. Agricultural, botanical, and chemical results of experiments on the mixed herbage of permanent meadow, conducted for more than twenty years in succession on the same land. [Read 19 June 1879, 17 June 1880, and 16 November 1899.] Philosophical Transactions of the Royal Society 171 (1880): 289–416; 173 (1882–3): 1181–413; 192 (1900): 139–210.
